memberdef.definition: typedef void(* mdm_hl7800_event_callback_t) (enum mdm_hl7800_event event, void *event_data)
memberdef.name: mdm_hl7800_event_callback_t

detaileddescription.para: event - The type of event event_data - Pointer to event specific data structure HL7800_EVENT_NETWORK_STATE_CHANGE - compound event HL7800_EVENT_APN_UPDATE - struct mdm_hl7800_apn HL7800_EVENT_RSSI - int HL7800_EVENT_SINR - int HL7800_EVENT_STARTUP_STATE_CHANGE - compound event HL7800_EVENT_SLEEP_STATE_CHANGE - compound event HL7800_EVENT_RAT - int HL7800_EVENT_BANDS - string HL7800_EVENT_ACTIVE_BANDS - string HL7800_EVENT_FOTA_STATE - compound event HL7800_EVENT_FOTA_COUNT - uint32_t HL7800_EVENT_REVISION - string HL7800_EVENT_GPS - compound event HL7800_EVENT_GPS_POSITION_STATUS int HL7800_EVENT_POLTE_REGISTRATION mdm_hl7800_polte_registration_event_data HL7800_EVENT_POLTE mdm_hl7800_polte_location_data HL7800_EVENT_POLTE_LOCATE_STATUS int HL7800_EVENT_SITE_SURVEY mdm_hl7800_site_survey

briefdescription.para: Power off the HL7800.
Reset the HL7800 (and allow it to reconfigure).
Control the wake signals to the HL7800.

simplesect.para: this API should only be used for debug purposes.

parameterdescription.para: True to keep the HL7800 awake, False to allow sleep

briefdescription.para: Send an AT command to the HL7800.

simplesect.para: this API should only be used for debug purposes.

briefdescription.para: Get the signal quality of the HL7800.

parameterdescription.para: Reference Signals Received Power (dBm) Range = -140 dBm to -44 dBm
Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio (dBm) Range = -128 dBm to 40dBm

briefdescription.para: Get the SIM card ICCID.
Get the HL7800 serial number.
Get the HL7800 IMEI.
Get the HL7800 firmware version.
Get the IMSI.
Update the Access Point Name in the modem.
Update the Radio Access Technology (mode).
Register a function that is called when a modem event occurs.
Force modem module to generate status events.

simplesect.para: This can be used to get the current state when a module initializes later than the modem.

briefdescription.para: Get the local time from the modem's real time clock.

parameterdescription.para: The amount the local time is offset from GMT/UTC in seconds.

briefdescription.para: Read the operator index from the modem.
Get modem functionality.

simplesect.para: int32_t negative errno on failure, else mdm_hl7800_functionality

briefdescription.para: Set airplane, normal, or reduced functionality mode. Airplane mode persists when reset.

simplesect.para: Boot functionality is also controlled by Kconfig MODEM_HL7800_BOOT_IN_AIRPLANE_MODE.

briefdescription.para: When rate is non-zero: Put modem into Airplane mode. Enable GPS and generate HL7800_EVENT_GPS events. When zero: Disable GPS and put modem into normal mode.

simplesect.para: Airplane mode isn't cleared when the modem is reset.

briefdescription.para: Register modem/SIM with polte.io.

simplesect.para: It takes around 30 seconds for HL7800_EVENT_POLTE_REGISTRATION to be generated. If the applications saves the user and password information into non-volatile memory, then this command only needs to be run once.

briefdescription.para: Enable PoLTE.

parameterdescription.para: from polte.io or register command callback

briefdescription.para: Locate device using PoLTE.

simplesect.para: The first HL7800_EVENT_POLTE_LOCATE_STATUS event indicates the status of issuing the locate command. The second event requires 20-120 seconds to be generated and it contains the location information (or indicates server failure).

briefdescription.para: Perform a site survey. This command may return different values each time it is run (depending on what is in range).

detaileddescription.para: HL7800_EVENT_SITE_SURVEY is generated for each response received from modem.

briefdescription.para: HL7800 modem public API header file.

detaileddescription.para: Allows an application to control the HL7800 modem.
